1.「チャオー！| バジェオじいさんの家へ ようこそー！: Ciao! Welcome to Grandpa Vallejo's house!

2.「……って お前さん 見ない顔じゃな。| もしや わしの技師としてのウデを見込ん: You don't look familiar to me. Did you come|here to offer me a job because of my skill as|an engineer?

3.「じゃが 残念ー！ ワシは技師を辞めて| 隠居生活を 満喫チューなのじゃ！| 仕: But alas! I'm a retired engineer and I'm|enjoying my retirement! If you want to talk|about work, no thanks.

4.「……な なにっ？ お前さん| エイブラム船長の使いで来たじゃとっ！？: What? You're here on Captain Abram's errand!

5.「ふ…ふんっ！ エイブラムなんて 知らんもん！| 知らんって言ったら 知らんもん: I don't know anything about Abram! I don't|know Abram! I said I don't know, I don't know!

6.バジェオに|技師の工具かばんを 渡しますか？<yesno><close>: Would you give the engineer's tool bag to|Vallejo?<yesno><close>

7.「もう エイブラムなんて 知らんもん！| 知らんって言ったら 知らんもん！！: I don't know Abram anymore! When I say I don't|know, I don't know!

9.「これは…… ワシの仕事道具……！| しかも なんじゃ？ 壊れたスパナの代わりに: This... is my work tool. What's more, what is|it? Instead of a broken wrench, there's a|high-tech wrench in here...?

10.「くっ！ エイブラムめ！ なんで| ワシの愛用のスパナを 取り替えたんじゃ！？|: Damn! Abram! Why did you replace my beloved|wrench? You've made it so high-tech!

11.「ワシが あのスパナに| どれほどの愛着を持っていたか！ 壊れたら直し| 古さな: How much I loved that wrench! I used to fix it|when it broke, loving its old-fashioned|goodness!

12.「まったく 勝手なことをしやが……: What a selfish thing to do...

15.「勝手なことをするな……か。| そう言えば アイツも ケンカした時| 同じこと言: Don't do anything selfish...? Come to think of|it, he said the same thing when we had a|fight...

16.「……そうか。| アイツは こんな気持ちじゃったのか。: I see. So this is how he felt.

18.「エイブラムめ こしゃくなマネを！| オーケー オーケー！ ワシも 悪かったわ！: Abram, you're being an asshole! Okay, okay,|okay! I'm sorry too! I was the one who did it|in the first place!

19.「そう……。ワシは あのエイブラムが| 何より愛する グランドタイタス号の心臓部: Yes... I've messed with the heart of the Grand|Titus, which Abram loves more than anything|else... the power unit.

20.「修理の時…… ワシは ヤツのためを思い| あの船が 迷いの霧の嵐にも耐えられる:
When it came time for repairs...I did him a|favor by developing and installing a state-of-|the-art power unit that would allow the ship|
|to withstand the foggy storms of the stray.

21.「なのに アイツときたら 船の最大の| ミリョクである 武骨で味わいのある動力装:
And then he gets mad at me because I took the|liberty of turning the ship's most important|feature, its rugged and tasteful power unit,|
|into a high-tech one!

22.「あんときは なんて了見のせまいヤツじゃ！ と| 怒りにまかせ 工具かばんをほっ: What a narrow-minded guy I was then! I was so|angry that I left my tool bag behind and went|off the ship...

24.「まあ これで おあいこじゃ！| かばんを届けてくれたのは 技師を続けろという|: Well, now we're even! I'm sure Abram's|delivery of the bag was a message to you to|keep on being an engineer.

25.「さて……まずは この 技師の工具かばんで| たまった仕事を片付けることから 始: Well...let's start by getting the work done|that has accumulated in this engineer's tool|bag. Hmm? Speaking of which...

26.「グランゼドーラ城の例の装置も そろそろ……。| おっと！ すまん こっちの話じ: The device at Granzedora Castle should be|ready soon... Oops! Sorry, I was talking about|this one. Well, give my regards to Abram!

27.「チャオー！| 天才技師バジェオの家に ようこそー！: Ciao! Welcome to the home of the genius|engineer Vallejo!

28.「……っと お前さんか。| いつぞやは 世話になったのう。: Oh, it's you, isn't it? I've been indebted to|you the other day.

29.「エイブラムのヤツは 相変わらず素直じゃなくて| わざわざ スパナを交換して 届: The Abram's guy, as usual, was not so honest|and went to the trouble of replacing the|wrench and delivering it to me...

30.「工具が戻ってきて 正直 助かった。| グランゼドーラ城の あの装置も そろそろ: I'm honestly glad to have my tools back. It|was about time that that equipment at|Granzedora Castle got some maintenance!

31.「さすがは エイブラム！| バッチリ グッドな タイミングじゃったぞい！| ……: That's Abram! Perfectly timed! Well, give my|regards to Abram!
